review: Great product.The voice search actually works very well and I am surprised at how much I use and love it.I like that it when you search for a TV show, they will display the various ways to view it (free on Hulu when available, purchase it in HD/SD from amazon etc...).It's fast.The remote feels goodThe setup is painless.You can install the PLEX app (to stream your local movies)You can now view HBOgoHas built-in Amazon prime TV/movies streaming and a better display than reported in the initial release.Downside: ShowTime Anytime does not currently work with my cable provider (really!?!?!?) - Direct TV (Dish is also not supported). Roku remains the maximum compatibility device (has no content of their own/no-conflict of interest) and has been the longest at providing a streaming box.Does not support GoogleCast.  You wouldn't expect Amazon to support that since it's a competing content provider.Neither does Roku but I could see Roku supporting ChromeCast in the future (no conflict of interest).If ShowTime Anytime was supported by my cable company (Direct TV), I would be 100% satisfied.As it stands, it's a pain in the ass to have to switch to a different device (chromecast stick) or my old rokuto view anything on ShowTime.
